name: Rail Rush (2021)
description:
Hello, thank you for your interest in the game ! Here are some things you should know before downloading ! 

- This project was a class exercise made by 2 Game Designers using for the first time Unreal Engine 4 & the blueprint system.

- It took 1 month to create.

- The core loop of the game is functionnal and all highscore can be saved before quitting the game in the menu.

Manage the station, signal the presence of trains ready to be boarded, call the guards when fights break out and try to naviguate an overcrowded station.

Hope you enjoy this light hearted game inspired by the design of overcooked !
